title: Roasted pork chops with cheese sauce
ingredients: ['6 to 7 pork chops', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '150g ham, finely chopped', '1/2 teaspoon caraway seeds', '2 tablespoons oil', '40g butter', '40g plain flour', '500ml milk, warmed', 'salt, to taste', 'ground nutmeg, to taste', '60g grated Emmental cheese', '6 to 7 slices Emmental cheese']
